JobFullDesc: In People & Places, we handle all things people-related so our employees around the globe are empowered to do their best work. Our Human Resources and Employee Relations teams partner with the business to align people strategies with business goals.About the TeamThe Employee Experience team cares deeply about creating the most meaningful and effective experiences for our employees. Our aim is to enhance the quality of life at Uber. We work collaboratively across the entire People & Places (P&P) Team to establish thoughtful workplace practices designed around the needs of our people.
